flawed_nl_solution:
Peter has read 8 of these books because 20 x 0.4 = <<20*0.4=8>>8
His brother has read 2 of these books because 20 x 0.1 = <<20*0.1=2>>2
Peter has read 11 more books than his brother because 8 - 2 = <<11=11>>11
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
